name: Dashing Ant (C64) Commodore 64
description:
THE ANT COLONY IS IN DIRE STRAIGHTS! YOU ARE THE LAST HOPE TO RESCUE THE COLONY EGGLINGS AND THE XL- SIZE PRINCESS EGG.

* BEWARE THE FATAL FISH
* BEWARE THE CRAZED HYSTERICAL ANTS GONE INSANE AND PANICKED DUE TO DA  CATACYLISMIC TERRORS BEFALLING THE ANT COLONY.....
* BEWARE THE DEADLY WORMS!

Dashing Ant is a side-scrolling collect'em up.  Keep on your ant toes parkouring several ant colony tunnel platforms to retrieve eggs while dodging other crazy and panicked ants, deadly worms and freaky fish that have been flushed into the tunnels. Your colonies' tunnel system is collapsing, you have a limited crew of ants with wits still intact, assigned by the Queen to rescure all eggs!!
